patthana9.14:1.1: Nokilesaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanokilesaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana9.14:2.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.14:3.1: Nasaṅkilesikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkilesikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana9.14:4.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana9.14:5.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana9.14:6.1: Nakilesasampayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakilesavippayuttaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana9.14:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana9.14:8.1: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkilesikañca nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkilesikañceva nano ca kilesaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana9.14:9.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.14:10.1: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhañceva nano ca kilesaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakilesañceva nakilesavippayuttañca nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakilesavippayuttañceva nano ca kilesaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana9.14:11.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ nasaṅkilesikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… kilesavippayuttaṃ naasaṅkilesikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
